senses.sense_definition: Действительное причастие прошедшего времени от глагола <w>донашивать</w>.

examples.text: Младший сын, <w>донашивавший</w> одежду за старшими братьями, мечтал о новой куртке.

target_lang_translations.en: The younger son, who was <w>wearing hand-me-downs</w> from his older brothers, dreamed of a new jacket.

examples.text: Пациентка, с трудом <w>донашивавшая</w> эту беременность, находилась под постоянным наблюдением врачей.

target_lang_translations.en: The patient, who was having difficulty <w>carrying</w> this pregnancy <w>to term</w>, was under constant medical observation.

target_lang_definitions.en: Past active participle of the verb 'донашивать', which means to wear clothes previously worn by someone else (hand-me-downs) or to carry a pregnancy to its full term.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: regarding clothes passed down from others
completing the full period of pregnancy
wearing something until it is completely unusable
